biography.summary: John Karl Fetterman is an American politician serving as a United States Senator from Pennsylvania since 2023. A member of the Democratic Party, he previously served as Lieutenant Governor of Pennsylvania and as mayor of Braddock, Pennsylvania.
biography.career: Fetterman began his career in community development and later entered politics, serving as Braddock, PA's mayor and, subsequently, as Pennsylvania's Lieutenant Governor before his Senate tenure.

contact.office_address: 142 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Support progressive tax reforms and investment in infrastructure.

timeline.event: Sworn in as United States Senator for Pennsylvania.
